title: GGS
description: Stax and Strangler find their lives on a collision course with an unknown force hell bent on taking over every Club in the south. As they attempt to solve the mystery of who is trying to destroy the biker community and why, prospects and family members fall victim and the GGS is forced to find a way to save themselves, their Club and ultimately the very MCs that consider them unworthy.
author: Pamela Murdaugh-Smith
